mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Questions (title, body, memberId) VALUES (#{title}, #{body}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: SELECT q.id, q.title, q.inserted, q.memberId, m.nickName writerNickName FROM Questions q JOIN Member m ON q.memberId = m.id GROUP BY id ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{from }, #{row }
SELECT q.id, q.title, q.body, q.inserted, m.id memberId, m.nickName writerNickName FROM Questions q JOIN Member m ON q.memberId = m.id WHERE q.id = #{id}
